title: Dramatic Tokyo Coronavirus Spike Parallels Scary New York Outbreak
description: Since late March, scientists warned that Japan is likely to be the next coronavirus pandemic hotspot after the U.S., with Tokyo its epicenter. The post Dramatic Tokyo Coronavirus Spike Parallels Scary New York Outbreak appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Doctor warns that Tokyo is like New York three weeks ago, as coronavirus fear intensifies.
